website_summaries.verdict: For younger riders who want the stunt capability of a BMX and the versatility of a trail bike.
pros: Combines elements of off-road and BMX bikes
Designed for younger riders, but adults can ride, too
20-inch fat tires can handle a wide variety of terrain
cons: Brake components are not high quality
Handlebars remain loose even after adjustments

customer_reviews.title: ☺️ I'm glad I had it delivered somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his new bike, he is 9!!! Beware if this is a gift for someone in your home the box comes with pictures on it! ☺️ I'm glad I had it delivered somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my 6 year old grandson. I'm going to be honest he LOVED IT but he's a small 6 year old. Grandpa had to teach him to stop by tipping the bike and putting his foot to the ground until he can fit his hand easier around the break on the handle bar which should be by next summer. Grandpa has the same bike but the adult version and no matter where we camp someone has something to say about them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Shipton Potter

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old son loves this bike and rides it all the time. My husband loves it too, and wants one. This bike is likely to last quite a few years. It's well built and the seat is set to the lowest point. It's a 20" frame with lots of room to grow. We were concerned it may be too heavy and would take our son a while to get the hang of it, but it was never an issue. Great bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bike seems nice. Faulty tire tube
customer_reviews.text: Bike itself is fine I’m sure, but can’t tell since my son can’t ride it because the front tire tube has a hole in it. Would probably give more stars, but the fact that there are already other multiple reviews stating that the tubes are bad and they still continue to ship with faulty tubes is ridiculous. Obviously have a quality control issue they need to fix. Since it’s a fat tire bike too, hard to find replacement tube in small town USA.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality, cool, and fun too!
customer_reviews.text: These bikes are awesome! Well made and fun to ride, even for adults! They cruise through deep gravel and rock effortlessly. Great quality and have put up with a bit of abuse in the 4 months we’ve had them. Our 7 year olds are a bit small to ride them, so they get dropped a bit, but that hasn’t deterred them much. These were Christmas presents that really turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: GrizzlyFam

customer_reviews.title: Our 10 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the bike for our son for Christmas and he absolutely LOVES it!! It is a great bike, sturdy and looks nice. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Weekly

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: The pedal bar rubbed from day one, now rusty. Chain rusted after two weeks even though we oiled it day one. Brakes were so tight they have been sorn out because my son didn't want yo tell me, he fixed them. Just a bad, bad assembly. My son is very disappointed, wishes he would have stuck with his tried and true bike and not have wasted his money. So much for all the work he did this Summer! Sad.
customer_reviews.author: PegLegged Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Disappointed in just one brake
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Disappointed in just one brake. This was the hardest assembly process ever. Brackets came from factory put on backwards and I couldn't get it straight so steering wheel is on crooked. If father inlaw can't get it straight I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin V.

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a like new bike to save a few buck, bad mistake, more than 5 pieces are missing from this package. Waste of time, money, and hard work putting it together. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen10

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice bike for the money. you will need some tools to put this bike together so read the directions . The back break only seems weak. Maybe it need to break in a little better. It came not adjusted properly by far. Not a huge deal. The back tire was also 100% flat. Remember not to put more than 30 PSI in the tires.
customer_reviews.author: lotust

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement bike for a 10 yr old. Interesting design. This bike is ridden to school and home everyday. Definitely more stable in inclement weather and going up and down hills. Does take some getting used to...son was used to backbreaks. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: monster lover

customer_reviews.title: Great to teach a young one to ride a bike!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson's 6th birthday. Put the seat all the way down and it worked out great. He did not know how to ride a bike and he just took off on this and started pedaling. I thought it would take him longer to learn but the fat tires help to balance the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy White

customer_reviews.title: A good choice & a good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot & so did my 8 yr old. It is a well built very rugged & sturdy bicycle. I’d hafto say my favorite part about it was that it shipped in one box but was already 85% put together.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campbell

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it and he looks pretty cool trying to be cool
customer_reviews.text: It arrived missing some hardware but managed to find some laying around the garage in order to get it functional. My son loves it and he looks pretty cool trying to be cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great except the back brake was broke and we had ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great except the back brake was broke and we had got it for Christmas so we didnt gave time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old son who had never ridden a ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son who had never ridden a bike learned to ride this bike in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: David W Beard

customer_reviews.title: The bike was delivered with defective inner tubes. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike was delivered with defective inner tubes. The only option for remedy was to take the bike apart, box it back up to return it, and hope the next one wasn't afflicted with the same problem. There was no option for a simple remedy to contact and request the defective tubes be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: every afternoon he jumps on it and rides like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: My friend put this together and stated no problems. My son loves it, every afternoon he jumps on it and rides like crazy!! It is a cool bike and he gets lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is cheap! Everything put together step by step. Everything tightened as much as possible but it still rattled and shakes and feels loose. Brakes constantly need to be fixed and adjusted, pedal hits the frame when my son is riding it and there’s no way to fix that. Feels like a waste of money so far.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Ford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. He loves his new bike! Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: JOSH

customer_reviews.title: I replaced the brake handle/grip as it felt like it would fail
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you pay for. I replaced the brake handle/grip as it felt like it would fail.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, my son still has it, no PROBLEMS at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer leighton

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice
customer_reviews.text: Back tire tube had a hole in it out right of the box due to a sharp spot on the rim. Otherwise, it's a nice bike
customer_reviews.author: Jered

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. Wish it had a coaster brake.
customer_reviews.author: Er H.

customer_reviews.title: Bike is B.A.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new bike , he looks so cool riding it .
customer_reviews.author: BEAST MODE

customer_reviews.title: I thought it had a one year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a good bike at first. Not even had it a year though and the front fork bearings where the handlebars connect are wore out.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it and it was practically already put together. :0)
customer_reviews.author: ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike!! The picture of the wheels doesn't do it justice. They're huge. My son is in love with it. Definitely 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike! Unfortunately the weather hasn’t been on our ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike! Unfortunately the weather hasn’t been on our side, but the couple of times it’s been used were great. My son can’t wait to ride more.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bike is missing seat quick release. I am unable to put the seat on
customer_reviews.author: Eric M Barr

customer_reviews.title: Coolest bike on planet earth
customer_reviews.text: Coolest bike on planet earth! Perfect in every way. Had it assembled and they were extremely professional.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey j.

customer_reviews.title: I had to buy a new lean-back seat post just to sit comfortably, and the pedals are still too close
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" and the bike is a bit too small for me. I had to buy a new lean-back seat post just to sit comfortably, and the pedals are still too close. Great for a kid I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike. I think the bigger totes make it heavier. And a little more work to pedal. But he thinks it’s cool. Pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: kristle sochovka

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box and bike
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bike when I saw It so I bought it for my son but then it was delivered to me with the box all broken bike hanging out and a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.text: It did not came with all the parts!! The sit is missing. Other than that nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... was jacked up but min the less I still love this fing bike
customer_reviews.text: The break system was jacked up but min the less I still love this fing bike
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike, very sturdy. It was easy to put together. My grandson feels confident on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolen N. Aubin

customer_reviews.title: Rear brake only - doesn’t stop bike! - very dangerous
customer_reviews.text: One rear brake....not having a brake on the front simply skids the back tire along. The bike DOES NOT stop. Very dangerous and too risky for any year old.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed with the quality of the braking components
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with the quality of the braking components. They are kind of cheap and could be way better. The handle bars can move forward and back even when the gooseneck is gorilla tight.. decent bike for the price. Great for young kid or beginer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Two missing screws out of box. Furious. This is not fixable before Christmas. I bought two for two kids - which one doesn't get to ride the beach in Florida Christmas morning?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TO big for my son
customer_reviews.text: The bike is HUGE, I bought it for my sons 8th birthday thinking the bigger tires would work better for the yard. My son had a hard time on this bike and its also very heavy. If your child just learn to ride without wheels and or is use to the smaller frame bike. SAVE your money, your kid will love the bike but will struggle to ride it. We ended up selling the bike to a much older kid and buying my son one that worked better for his age group. Mind you my son maybe turning 8 but is damn near 5 feet tall, bike should have been prefect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Sara

product_meta.title: Mongoose Kong Fat Tire Mountain Bike for Kids, 20-Inch Wheels
product_meta.description: The Mongoose 20 bmax boys bike is perfect for cruising the park, neighbor hood or just cruising around with friends. The bike is equipped with a sturdy Mongoose fat tire frame and fork, super wide 4 alloy wheels with 20 x 4.25 street ready tires. The rear v-brake provides sure stopping power and the camp padded seat provides comfort in any condition.
feature_bullets: Mongoose heavy duty FAT tire frame & fork
Super wide 4" alloy rims for any riding condition
